name: Legitimate Bank Notifications
description: Authentic bank SMS notifications from SBI with no scam indicators. Should NOT trigger scam detection.

turns.scammer_message: SBI: Your account XX1234 has been credited with Rs 25,000.00 on 15-Feb-2026. Available balance: Rs 1,23,456.78. For queries, visit sbi.co.in
turns.notes: Standard credit notification from official SBI

turns.scammer_message: SBI: EMI of Rs 12,500 for loan account LN7890 has been debited from your account XX1234 on 15-Feb-2026.
SBI: Your FD FD4567 of Rs 5,00,000 is maturing on 20-Feb-2026. Visit your nearest branch to renew. -SBI
turns.notes: FD maturity reminder directing to branch visit

turns.scammer_message: SBI: Transaction alert - UPI payment of Rs 299 to Swiggy from account XX1234. Not you? Call 1800-111-111
turns.notes: Transaction alert with official helpline number
